WorkItem.ClosedComment: Explanation given and 0 DPS when target not poisonable fixed.
WorkItem.Description: I have also posted in the discussions section, but I figured it would be good to repost here as well. Changes in poisons or rotation are not showing any dps change with the current version.
WorkItem.Summary: [Rogue] Options Pane changes are not updating calcs

Comments.Message:
Please give more explanation for this issue and a character file with which you have this problem.
Changes in the custom rotation options won't reflect in the DPS you see at the bottom when on the options panel, only in the Custom Rotation DPS on the Stats panel.
Changes above the custom rotation options can change your optimal DPS though. Unchecking the target poisonable option gives 0 DPS on one of my test chars, so I'll at least fix that :)
